item.title: Save 20 Percent on Our Favorite Android Earbuds
item.description: The Nothing Ear (a) are svelte and elegant, with great sound quality and a more compelling price than ever.

item.title: This Is the Group That's Been Swatting US Universities
item.description: WIRED spoke to a self-proclaimed leader of an online group called Purgatory, which charged as little as $20 to call in fake threats against schools.

item.title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL Review
item.description: Google’s trio of 10th-generation Pixels is better than ever, but there’s an off-putting dose of generative Al.

item.title: Best Window Air Conditioners 2025: 11 Picks to Cool You for Years
item.description: These WIRED-tested AC units have been lodged into our windows and cooling our homes for months, if not years.

item.title: The Magic Phrase Behind Donald Trump’s Power Grab
item.description: The Trump administration frequently invokes the president’s priorities to justify its actions—regardless of whether they align with the law.
